column5: WOW!
congratulations!! Proud daddy now...God bless you all !!!
Thats what i was thinking...Congrats to you and mum.

Well as some of you know my girlfriend and I have been expecting another baby. Well after her being over a week late and supposed to be born on Feb 14th I have been getting very worked up and just wanted to hold my new child. The wife was supposed to get induced this morning so we were all ready but the baby had other plans.  4am Wed morning the day before being induced my girlfriend wakes me up saying she is having contractions. So I timed them out to see and determine whether we should go to the hospital, she wasn't ready so we stayed up and watched some tv and just relaxed. Well it wasn't until about noon when we were getting closer so we went to Grimsby where she was having her and stayed at my grandparents just to be closer. Well around 2:30pm we headed to the hospital and from there on things started to happen quick. After waiting well over an hour for her to get the epidural and getting it around 5:30 things slowed down after that. I was going crazy with excitment lol.  Finally at 8:13pm my second daughter was born and perfectly healthy. She was a monster as well lol. My first daughter was a big baby at 8.13lbs and my girlfriend is a small girl. Well my newest daughter was 9.2lbs. It was great though as this time there were no complications as there were before and I was happily able to cut the cord. I couldn't have asked for things any beetter and I am a proud father of two beautiful girls.  We named my daughter Grace and my girlfriend and I couldn't be any happier.  Here are two pictures of my new daughter.      Thank you  Chris.  If my typing isn't great sorry I am tired as I haven't slept more then 2 hours in I don't know how long.
Congrats, again, Chris!!
Big congrats Chris, Beautiful baby girl Grace and proud papa.  Might just as well forget about fishing for awhile.
Congratulations!  There's no greater joy than a "little" addition to the family.
Wonderful good news. I am so happy for you. I still remember everything about the moment each of my children was born. I wish a long life of love and happiness for your family.
congrats on the new addition!!!
Congrats!
Great news bud  9lbs - wow - that is a healthy baby
Congrat's Chris!!!  Looking forward to getting out steelheading with you soon.
Finally,  you can basque in the love of Grace. She is definately a keeper Chris, and looks a lot like you 	 - the beard of course Great news!!!!
Congrats !!!!
That's great news man!  Congrets.  My first is due Sept 3rd!  Seeing this post has got me excited.  But 9.2lbs have got me a little scared for my wife
Congratulations! This PB is going to be hard to top...
Definite keeper Chris    Congrats to the both of you
Congrats! That is a good sized baby. Glad everyone is healthy and happy. We have about a month to go on our 2nd, another girl.
Right On --Congrats
Wow, congrats, what a cutie
Thanks Everyone. I appreciate it. We got here home now and she is well, she is having a nice nap in my arms right now.  Congrats to you N.A.W and torco. Nothing better that is forsure.
Thanks Everyone. I appreciate it. We got here home now and she is well, she is having a nice nap in my arms right now.  Congrats to you N.A.W and torco. Nothing better that is forsure.
Congrats!!!
Congrats!!!
Thanks guys. Shes already a blast to be with.
